text:
Timothy James "Tim" Curry (19 April 1946), is an English actor, voice actor, singer and composer. He is well known for his roles in "The Rocky Horror Picture Show", "Clue", "It", ' and "The Three Musketeers". He has released three albums.
Personal life and stroke.
Curry resides in Toluca Lake, Los Angeles, California.
In July 2012, Curry suffered a major stroke. As a result of the stroke, he now uses a wheelchair.
